text: Olindiriza oyo gwoba oyagadde ku bo ate nootwala oyo gwoba oyagadde ate oyo gwoba osazeewo mu abo boolindirizza tolina kibi (singa oba osazeewo noomutwala) ekyo kye kitandikirwako mu kutebenkeza amaaso gaabwe ne batanakuwala era bonna nebasiima ebyo byoba obawadde, era Katonda amanyi ebyo ebiri mu mitima gya mmwe, anti bilijjo Katonda mumanyi nnyo wa kisa
